# allowsCutCopyPaste

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the image view lets the user cut, copy, and paste the image contents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsCutCopyPaste: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is YES, the user can cut, copy, or paste the image in the image view.

## Responding to user events

- **isEditable**: A Boolean value indicating whether the user can drag a new image into the image view.
